wikisource-export-portlet: Heading for a portlet/section of the sidebar. Usually exactly the same as {{msg-mw|coll-print_export}} and similar to {{msg-mw|toolbox}}.
wikisource-download-epub: Link text to download an EPUB format file.
wikisource-download-epub-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download an EPUB file.
wikisource-download-mobi: Link text to download a MOBI format file.
wikisource-download-mobi-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download a MOBI file.
wikisource-download-pdf: Link text to download a PDF format file.
wikisource-download-pdf-tooltip: Tooltip text for the link to download a PDF file.
wikisource-download-choose: Link text to go to an external page to download other formats.
wikisource-download-choose-tooltip: Tooltip text for the 'other formats' link.
wikisource-download-button: Label text for the main 'download' button adjacent to the page title.
wikisource-download-chooser-title: Title for a small dialog window showing a list of download options.
wikisource-download-chooser-epub:
{{optional}}
Link text for the EPUB download option.
wikisource-download-chooser-epub-descrip: Description text for the EPUB download option, shown in grey below the link text.
wikisource-download-chooser-mobi:
{{optional}}
Link text for the MOBI download option.
wikisource-download-chooser-mobi-descrip: Description text for the MOBI download option, shown in grey below the link text.
wikisource-download-chooser-pdf:
{{optional}}
Link text for the PDF download option.
wikisource-download-chooser-pdf-descript: Description text for the PDF download option, shown in grey below the link text.
wikisource-download-chooser-different-fo: Link text for different format download option.
wikisource-ocr-extract-text: Displayed text of the OCR button.
wikisource-ocr-extract-cancel:
Button text for the 'cancel' button shown in the loading widget.
{{identical|Cancel}}
wikisource-ocr-extract-text-title: Tooltip text for the OCR button.
wikisource-ocr-error:
Error message.

$1 is the message text.
wikisource-ocr-no-text: Error message displayed when no text was retrieved but no actual error message was given (for example, the page is correctly blank).
wikisource-ocr-settings-menu: Tooltip text for the OCR settings menu.
wikisource-ocr-engine: Form label for the engine-selection field.
wikisource-ocr-engine-tesseract: Radio button label for the Tesseract engine.
wikisource-ocr-engine-google: Radio button label for the Google engine.
wikisource-ocr-advanced: Button text for a link to open a new tab for the advanced settings.
wikisource-ocr-advanced-title: Tooltip text for the advanced settings form.
wikisource-ocr-overwrite-warning: Warning message shown when trying to extract text but the edit area is not empty.
wikisource-ocr-onboarding-text: Text paragraph for the onboarding popup.
wikisource-ocr-onboarding-button: Confirmation button label for the onboarding popup.
